lead_paragraph: WOLNEK--Stephen. "There are three crowns: the crown of Torah, the crown of Priesthood, and the crown of Royalty. But the crown of a good name is superior to them all." (Pirkei Avot 4:13). In loving memory of Stephen Wolnek, our friend, colleague, and fellow past International President of The United Synagogue of Conservative Judaism. May the memory of his good deeds and tireless efforts on behalf of Jewish people everywhere be a blessing to all who admired him. Alan Ades, Franklin D. Kreutzer, Richard Skolnik, and Judy Yudof 1/3
